landing.title: MONOPOLY
landing.subtitle: Gather Your Friends and Family to Play
landing.subtitle.description:
Looking for a fun and engaging way to spend time with your friends and family?
Look no further than the classic Monopoly game!
Gather everyone around the computer and enjoy hours of fun, strategy, and competition
landing.feature1: Up to 6 players can play on a single computer, making it a great option for family game nights or get-togethers with friends
landing.feature2: Adjust the game settings to your liking, including the length of the game, the starting money amount, and the number of players
landing.feature3: Experience the classic Monopoly game in digital form, complete with buying and selling properties, collecting rent, and more
landing.feature4: The game is user-friendly and easy to navigate, with simple controls that anyone can understand
landing.feature5: Monopoly is a game that has been enjoyed by people of all ages for decades, making it a perfect choice for family gatherings and social events

rules.goal.title: Goal
rules.goal.desc: Win, remaining the only player not bankrupt.
rules.game.title: Game
rules.game.desc1: The players take turns throwing dice. The player who threw the highest number starts.
rules.game.desc2: The player rolls the dice and moves the chip along the arrow to the number of fields that fell on the dice. There can be three players' chips on the same field at the same time. Depending on which field the player has stopped on, he performs the following actions:
rules.game.desc2.item1: Buys Property (if it is not occupied)
rules.game.desc2.item2: Asks the banker to put the Property up for auction (if he does not want to buy it)
rules.game.desc2.item3: Pays rent (if the property belongs to another player)
rules.game.desc2.item5: Takes a Chance card (or Public Treasury)
rules.game.desc3: When the player collects all the cards of the same color, he can build Houses and Hotels on his plots.
rules.game.desc4: If the money runs out, the player can mortgage or sell the Property to pay off creditors. If a player cannot raise enough money to pay rent, tax, or pay a bill, he is declared bankrupt and quits the game
rules.game.desc5: Players are not allowed to lend money to each other. But you can accept any Property instead of money as payment.
rules.game.desc6: If a player throws a double, he walks as usual, and then rolls the dice again. If a player throws doubles three times in a row in one turn, he goes to jail
rules.game.desc7: The game continues until there is only One player left. He becomes the winner
rules.purchase.title: Purchase of property
rules.purchase.disc1: There are three types of Property in the game:
rules.purchase.disc2: When a player stops at a free Property, he can buy it. In this case, the player pays the banker the amount indicated on the field. In this case, the player receives the Owner's card, which he must put face up in front of him. If the player refuses to buy the Property, it is put up for auction
rules.purchase.disc3: If a player owns a Property, he receives rent from other players who stay on it. When a player collects all the Property of the same color, i.e. becomes a monopolist, he can build Houses and Hotels on plots of this color and collect increased rent!
